channel.title: Need help with client titlebox and titlebuttons
channel.description: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/t00ohw.png[/img] Okay so I made the titlebox and titlebuttons pink (for transparency) and it comes up pink still in the client.. how can i fix this?

item.title: Need help with client titlebox and titlebuttons
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

chaosplaya09:

You Allways Could Use “paint.net” And Use The Wand Tool For Transparency.

Again, the cache editor does not support an alpha channel, and neither does the older RS client

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with client titlebox and titlebuttons

item.title: Need help with client titlebox and titlebuttons
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:2, topic:524904”]make sure you save it as a .png file.

Why don’t you be a normal person and just make the background transparent the proper way. I know why pink is an option for the client but it sucks to do so imo.[/quote]
Because the cache editor does not take into account transparent areas.

@OP: That is the wrong pink. Technically you want to use magenta, which is #FF00FF.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with client titlebox and titlebuttons
